2000

Thelma Schoonmaker

She has won three awards

in the category Film Editing,

all with movies

directed by Martin Scorsese.

She received two of these

awards in the last twenty

years for The Aviator (2004)

and The Departed (2006).

She got her first award

in 1980 for Raging Bull.

Margaret Sixel

She has only been nominated

in one ocassion, in which

she won for the movie

Mad Max: Fury Road (2016).

She has participated as editor

in many other of movies,

including some of George

Miller’s, Sixel’s husband.

2021
